title: Smart Data Models - Smart Metering Observation
description: This entity contains a harmonised description of a Smart Meter Observation, generally applicable for Smart Homes, Industry, Cities and Agriculture.

type.description: Property. It has to be SmartMeteringObservation. NGSI entity type

payloadVersion.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. The entity specification version. A version number of 2.0 or later denotes the entity is represented using NGSI-LD

measurement.description: Property. Array describing the different measurements

value.description: Property. The value of the measurement

observationTime.description: Property. The instant of the measurement

anyOf.description: Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity
Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity

refDevice.description: Property. Unique identifier of the entity
